title: Miyeon
summary:
One day, I became the heroine of a love simulation game, Deborah. After seeing that I would be sent back to my world after achieving a Happy Ending, I finally managed to receive the confession of the male leads through many struggles.

[ Normal Ending achieved! ] ‘What? Normal ending? Didn’t the happy ending with the female lead and male lead end well?!’

The second round started again after failing to achieve a happy ending. ‘Oh, I don't know, tell them to stop this!’ It's none of their business to decide my life. I have to be happy! Unlike the first round, I’m going to do what I want to do... But aren’t the male leads acting a bit weird?!

---
Romance simulation video games are usually a mess-free way to date handsome men, but after Shiyeon Choi wakes up in one, she wants out! In her new gamified life, she quickly realizes how rude the male leads are. Thus, Shiyeon decides to "Bad End" all of her love interests, determined to give them a taste of their own medicine. But despite beating the game, she finds herself back at the beginning once again. In this round, she plans to live freely and blow off the MLs... but will she succeed, or is romance in the air after all?

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57947743)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/a-single-round-at-romance-is-enough)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/95875)

title: I Became the Wife of the Monstrous Crown Prince
summary:
Heroine has traveled back in time and entered the universe of *Lady and the Beast*, a 19th century soft porn trashy novel. She finds herself in the body of Anthea, child bride of the Monster Crown Prince Blake, who has been cursed to die at the age of 18 due to this sins of his ancestor. In the novel, Anthea should have committed suicide after looking at the horrible cursed birth marks on Prince Blake's body. But she tries to rewrite a part of the story by instilling confidence in Blake and showering him with unconditional love, just until he is ready to meet his "real" true love, Diana.

---
She transmigrated into the body of Ancia, the current wife of the monstrous crown prince, Blake, in an R-19 romance novel.

In the original story, Ancia committed suicide on the day of their marriage, leaving Blake with massive trauma. But this time, Ancia wouldn’t do such a thing.

Blake was the second male lead in the original novel. He was portrayed as a beast that possessed an exquisite facade. Yet, right now, he was behaving just like an innocent rabbit.

The only person who can remove the crown prince’s curse is the heroine, Diana. My role is to just keep this little boy from getting hurt and then step down in time, but...

“Ancia, don’t leave me!”

This little rabbit keeps chasing me.

---
Original Webtoon: [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/338), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58817781)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/338/?languageCode=en)

* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/2661)

title: The Male Lead and I Are Trapped In A Horror Game
The Revenge of the Abandoned Daughter of a Prestigious Magic Family
summary:
“Lucia, I can't express how thankful I am that you're here.”

The most powerful mage family in the empire, the Rodbell family. And beneath that glorious name lies the family’s disgrace, the half-blood Rodbell.

“I’m really glad you're my daughter.”

I’ve endured all kinds of contempt and worked hard just to hear these words. For my entire life, craving affection, my father smiled for the first time and said to me, “With your lowly body, Rodbell will enjoy its golden age for the next hundred years. Be proud.”

The Abyss (Abyssus), a bottomless pit, so deep and wide that the end is invisible, where the Evil God is sealed. To maintain its power, once every hundred years, Rodbell’s bloodline must be sacrificed there.

‘I can't die like this.’

I couldn’t let my death be used and discarded for them. As they were all distracted, I tried to escape.

‘Goodbye. Foolish, dumb Lucia.’

With an angelic smile and the most dreadful malice, I fell into hell.

──────────

[Something interesting has fallen.]

In the endless darkness, a soft voice filled with laughter approached like salvation.

“I’ll help you.”

With an irresistible sweet proposal.

“How about this time, you make them fall into the abyss?”

──────────

I returned to the past.

I was about to leave after achieving everything I wanted.

“I’ll give Rodbell to you. I’ll give you whatever you desire. So…”

Why you?

The one who hated me the most.

“Don’t leave, Lucia.”

Why are you clinging to me?

title: Please Marry Me Again, Husband!
summary:
Gun-ha and So-yeon were strongly attracted to each other, but because they lived completely different lives their marriage ended short and eventually they chose to divorce.

Five years later, Gun-ha proposes to Seo-yeon again to be a ‘contract couple’.
“Please marry me again. This time, we stay as an ordinary couple.”

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/the-remarriage-contract/list?title_no=3227)

title: One Day My Sister Died
summary: A short Twitter manga by Hamaken wherein a brother's younger sister struggles to maintain eye contact with him, except...

title: The Wicked Ladies in Waiting
summary: Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”

title: I Mistook the Hidden Identity of the Sub Male Lead
summary:
Mary Siringa has finally realized the error of her ways as a spoiled burden to her family. In her search for a job, she runs into Prince Grandiel, disguised as his alter ego, Nepenthes. Intrigued by Mary, Grandiel draws up a magical contract for her to be a maid in the imperial palace and work as his spy. Now, Mary must protect Grandiel's secret identity and comply with the other clauses of her contract, or else her heart will explode! Can Mary keep her true self hidden, or will she die trying?

---
**Official Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%95%EC%B2%B4%EB%A5%BC-%EC%88%A8%EA%B8%B4-%EC%84%9C%EB%B8%8C%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EC%97%90%EA%B2%8C-%EC%9E%98%EB%AA%BB-%EA%B1%B8%EB%A0%B8%EB%8B%A4/3147), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55798486)

title: The World’s Best Engineer
summary:
Yuuto is suddenly reincarnated into the other world in a smartphone game and becomes the third son of a noble family. "Skills" exist in that world, and Yuuto was reincarnated with 
"Noblesse oblige." When Yuuto, who has become an adult, embraces a woman as a ceremony, "Noblesse oblige" is activated. That is a rare skill, the skill that lets him copy the skills of the woman he embraces! Yuuto embraces women possessing skills one after another, becoming the strongest with the skills he acquires, and building a harem of women who fall in love with him. Furthermore, it was discovered that "Noblesse oblige" can awaken skills and evolve skills, and the cheating keeps on coming! All the women and skills I want are mine!

title: Apocalypse Sword God
summary:
If mercy and kindness can’t save the world, then this time, I choose to kill—

Eternal Slayer! Heavenly Lightning Slash! Sword of Annihilation! As long as you learn the most common sword skills, they can be upgraded to SSS rank?! Divine talent + forbidden skills! I’m the last spark of hope in this apocalypse!

title: High School Musical Genius Is Paganini Reincarnated
summary: The Rebirth of Paganini, Joo-won Moon. He was once a gifted violinist, but due to an injury, he gradually distanced himself from music and lived the life of a regular high school student. “I don’t pursue music.” However, perhaps the irony of fate… Joo-won Moon accidentally transferred to the music class of an arts high school, he picked up the violin… Will Joo-won Moon be able to overcome his psychological trauma? And is there a chance for him to be reborn as a true violinist?

title: Solo Max-Level Newbie
summary:
Kang Jinhyeok, a gaming streamer and content creator, is the only person who has cleared the game, [Tower of Trials]. However, as the game’s popularity declines, it becomes increasingly difficult for him to continue making a living as a content creator. 

Jinhyeok prepares to end his 11-year-long relationship with the game and say goodbye to his humble group of subscribers. But on that very day, the Tower of Trials appears in reality with a message saying that humanity will perish unless all players clear each floor within 90 days.

Jinhyeok, who knows the game better than anyone, decides to use his knowledge to his advantage and dominate the tower.

title: The Luoyang Branch of the Heavenly Demon Cult
summary: What does "Mu" (武) in martial hero (武俠) mean? It is the power to enforce one's own sense of justice (俠). If that power extends beyond oneself, through others, and reaches the ends of the world, then that is the realm of the divine (神). What does a mere human need to ascend to godhood (入神)? Now begins the epic of Pi Wolryeo in search of that answer!

title: The Heroine’s Friend Strikes Back
summary: Reborn as a side character wrongfully accused and executed, Mia resolves to rewrite her fate. Returning to the moment she first met the villainous heroine, she vows to stand tall and fight back, sparking a thrilling rebellion against a fabricated destiny.

title: The Princess is Evil
summary:
Long-term public service exam candidate Minseo finds himself trapped in the game, "Raising Lena", as he tries to escape his grim reality. 

In the game, Minseo becomes a character named Leo, and he must navigate through a world with three different scenarios to accomplish his mission of turning the game's protagonist, Lena, into a princess. However, "Raising Lena" boasts an overwhelming level of difficulty due to enemies who are set to thwart Minseo with their immense power and influence.

Will Minseo be able to complete the game by making Lena a princess and return to reality?

title: The Crazy Killer Whale’s Favourite Penguin
summary:
Born as a penguin, I miraculously transformed into a human. The problem? My guardian, the Tower Master, hates beastmen. Fearing discovery, I ran away, only to be found out by a self-proclaimed penguin enthusiast.

Whale clan orca beastman, Suuradel, looked at me intensely, his eyes reddening sensually.

“Ha… Your wild eyes are incredible.”

Those aren’t eyes, just white feathers.

“May I touch your belly fat?”

Seriously? Furious, I pecked at him, but he looked oddly elated.

“Did you just kiss me?”

…It seems I got caught by a lunatic, not a penguin enthusiast.

title: Cavier Falcon Princess
summary:
Zelle, the eighth royal princess of Roymonde, who was driven to the brink of defeat in the war. She was kidnapped by the enemy, and when she woke up... She became a bird?!

Fortunately or unfortunately, as the messenger bird of Commander-in-Chief, Valhayle! She struggles for her country even though she is in a bird’s body.

But you can't even do as much as treat me like a bird!!

---
After losing consciousness while fleeing the war raging in Roymund Kingdom, Princess Zeline wakes up in the body of a messenger falcon! She’s now the bird in charge of delivering information for Commander Valhyle and his army, who are searching for the remaining royal descendants. She may be tiny and feathered, but Zeline is determined to use her missions to find out what happened to her family. Can this little birdie gain the skeptical commander’s trust and give her kingdom new wings?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%84%EB%A0%B9%EC%83%88-%EC%99%95%EB%85%80%EB%8B%98/2531), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57066133)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/18033), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-falcon-princess/info)

* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/41)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Putri-Elang-Pembawa-Pesan/95)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/75612)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%88%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%AA%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3/205)

title: Oppa Husband
The Fake Saint of a Reverse Harem Game
I Healed The Male Lead’s Trauma
summary:
I was reincarnated as an extra, the non-existent childhood friend of the male lead, who dies early in the novel. I can’t even avoid the time limit dead flag. That’s why I was living like this…

 “Why aren’t you healthy?” 

“I’m healthy.”

 “Why are you sick again? Did I allow you to be sick?” 

The male lead became obsessed with my health. Oh, please, can someone get rid of this guy! — I was definitely reincarnated as an extra with no presence. But my new life is unfolding strangely. 

“Why are you doing this for me?”

 “Because I like you.” 

Suddenly the sunny male lead started sticking to me.. 

“Mom, do it for me.”

 “I’m a man.”

And a handsome guardian who became my mother (gender: male)…

 “Hello, daughter!” 

Even a dad who was supposed to die appeared before me… Also.. 

“From today on, I’m your dad.”

 A suspicious human was aiming to become my dad. Why did I put myself in this undeserved situation as an extra? Can I really become healthy?

title: Was His Highness Assassinated Today?
Adinmir’s Thorn Flower
The Wirepuller Gets Lucky in Happier Years
summary: When gifted fortune teller Park Doa dies, she transmigrates into the body of Bunnie, a curse absorber for the daughter of an archduke. As the new Bunnie, she befriends Demian, a boy prophesied to bring ruin to the empire. But when Bunnie reads Demian's fortune, she learns that, actually, he has the potential for greatness and prosperity, so she decides to shape him into the next emperor instead. Will these two be able to defy destiny and rewrite their futures? Or will the curse of fate prevail?

title: I’m a Worthless Stepmother, But I Love My Family Madly!
summary:
Elsa grew up in a family devoid of love and warmth, leaving her neglected and uneducated, branded as useless by those around her. However, destiny has a surprising twist in store. She receives a decree from the Emperor, commanding her to marry the formidable Duke Rolf Eiberg, a man renowned for his prowess on the battlefield and whispered about in the shadows for his cruelty, earning him the ominous title of “war maniac.”

Contrary to the expectations of those around her, Elsa views this marriage as a chance to change her life and find happiness. But upon arriving at the Duke's grand residence, she is shocked to find that her groom is absent. Instead, she encounters his two sons: the fiery Wilbert and the enigmatic Hugh, both unaware of their father’s impending marriage.

What follows is Elsa's arduous journey into a family cloaked in secrets, where every heart is ensnared by the barbed wire of detachment and mistrust. Can she uncover the truths hidden within these walls and cultivate love in a place overshadowed by the past?

title: Absolute Necromancer
summary:
Betrayed and killed by his fellow Ninestar guild members, the powerful necromancer Cha Jin-Hyuk resorts to a daring soul transference.

A decade later, he awakens in a new body, devoid of his former powers. With the support of his new comrades, Spirit Master Balkan and hobgoblin Haryu, he embarks on a quest for vengeance, scaling the mysterious tower once again.

Only this time, he possesses the overpowered abilities of an All-Master, enabling him to master all the classes within the tower!

title: I Live with My Villain Uncle
summary:
As she was busy bullying the honour student with the power of light magic, Maria Campbell, along with her friends, the fifteen year old daughter of a Duke Katarina Claes suddenly hit her head and remembered her previous life.   
  
Thanks to those memories, Katarina realized that she was actually the villainess of an otome game that she had played in her previous life, with a struggle to avoid the destruction flags that would lead to her doom awaiting her…  
  
Except, there's not even a year left before her destruction end!? The story of Katarina, who is on the verge of her demise, begins now…!  


* **Note:** This is a "What-If" story to the original *[Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shite shimatta...](https://mangadex.org/title/22637/otome-game-no-hametsu-flag-shika-nai-akuyaku-reijou-ni-tensei-shite-shimatta)* where Katarina receives memories of the real world from the moment the otome game starts when she's 15, and not from her childhood like in the original work.


---

title: Weapon Maker
summary:
"Here, try this sword."

Junseo Shin is a master weapon creator doing menial jobs to keep a low profile in a world teeming with monster dungeons. But his habit of lending weapons to those in need exposes him to mega guilds and covert figures out to kill budding heroes from his past life. 

Can Junseo craft his way out of trouble and uncover the conspiracy that followed him to this life?

title: Heavenly Inquisition Sword
summary:
“He is the master of the Nine Heavens.”

Yeon Jeokha was the child of a second wife. Viciously bullied by his father’s first wife and his siblings, he was later imprisoned in a warehouse after his father died of illness…

It has been ten years since his escape after he had learned martial arts that were out of the world.

“I regard the Yeon Family with great bitterness.”

The unstoppable adventure of the sole successor of the Heavenly Inquisition Sword, Yeon Jeokha, begins now!

title: Please Leave Emily Alone
summary: Emily Addisio, with her acceptance letter in hand, enters the academe, featuring of a happy academy life, but she suddenly gets into an accident. Ethan Valenti, who accidentally helped her, gradationally becomes attracted to Emily, and Emily also feels shocked by his aggressive style. Before Emily could feel a strange sense of relief, he seized the window hedge with his right hand, which reached up to his midriff, and fluently jumped inside the structure. ” What?” In a moment, a dark shadow fell on Emily, who was amazed by the unforeseen narrow distance. That was because Lord Valenti, who is higher than her, was looking at her with his reverse leaning against the window. And as the shadow girdled her, Emily artificially tried to step back. But before she could move, Valenti reached out to snare the handkerchief she was holding.” Thank you, Emily. That was kind of you, but you did not have to return it.” The beautiful romantic story of Emily, which is ordinary but always girdled by extraordinary situations, and Ethan, who gave her his first and last love.

title: The Illegitimate Who Devours Weapons
Don’t Pay Attention to The Villainess
One Step Forward to the Flower Path
summary:
I lived my whole life being used by other people and died at the age of sixteen. I thought it would be over like that, but when I opened my eyes again, I was back in the past. I thought I'd die while living the rest of my life in pain one more time. 

But suddenly, a father who I had never seen before appeared before me. My dad, whom I hadn't even known existed.

===

"When are you going to take away my powers?"

Dante's eyes shook greatly at Ivanna's words.

"Everyone did. You, when will you take it?"

"…I won't."

"Why?"

Ivanna couldn't understand. Everyone coveted her power. Everyone wanted it, saying she was a sacrifice sent by God for humans. So why does he refuse?

"No one will take your power now. No one will bother you. I'll protect you."

"You're trying to take my power."

"I'm not."

"Everyone said that and stole my power from me. They locked me up in prison."

It was too cruel for a mere five-year-old to say. But the young Ivanna's face had no emotion as if what she said were natural. Dante's heart eventually collapsed when he saw his daughter completely shattered.

---
Abducted from her mother at a young age and tortured for her incredible power, Evanna knew nothing but agony her whole life. That is until one day, she is rescued and returned to the father she never knew, the Duke of Vicente. But as Evanna’s very existence brings back painful memories for the Duke, he must learn how to love her, while Evanna must come to trust her father and heal her trauma. But with Evanna's power highly coveted, can these two overcome their thorny pasts for a rosier future?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%BD%83%EA%B8%B8%EA%B9%8C%EC%A7%80-%EC%95%9E%EC%9C%BC%EB%A1%9C-%ED%95%9C-%EA%B1%B8%EC%9D%8C/2845), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58273697)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/everythings-coming-up-roses)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E4%B8%80%E6%AD%A5%E4%B9%8B%E9%81%99%E7%9A%84%E5%B9%B8%E7%A6%8F/282)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/One-More-Step-to-the-Flowery-Path/93)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/89964)

title: Death Is The Only Ending For The Villainess
summary:
Penelope Eckart reincarnated as the adopted daughter of Duke Eckart and the villainess of a reverse harem dating sim. The problem is, she entered the game at its hardest difficulty, and no matter what she does, death awaits her at every ending! Before the "real daughter" of Duke Eckart appears, she must choose one of the male leads and reach a happy ending in order to survive. But the two brothers always pick a fight with her over every little thing, as well as a crazy crown prince, whose routes all lead to death. There's even a magician who's enamoured with the female lead, and a loyal slave knight! But somehow, the favourability meters of the male leads increase the more she crosses the line with them!

This is Penelope’s survival story, who’s been dropped in an insane reverse harem dating sim!

---

**Official English Translations:** [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/villains-are-destined-to-die), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/9012), [IzePress](https://yenpress.com/series/villains-are-destined-to-die)
*Tappytoon and Pocket are using the Tapas localization.*

title: My Affectionate Beast
summary:
The ‘Bluebird’s Letter’ exposed noble secrets, ruining families. When debates about its author raged, Kirien Kailos, the ‘Blood Wolf,’ confronted Saint Selene Leclair. 

“I know your secret,” he said, threatening to reveal her authorship unless she came to his mansion alone. 

Troubled, Selene sought advice from past saints. 

“Is he handsome?” they asked. 

“Yes,” she replied. 

“Then go. Life’s too short to miss opportunities."

title: The Real Daughter, She Is an Almighty Boss
summary: A highly skilled fighter wakes up in someone else's body and discovers that she's the Huffmans' lost daughter Gemma, regarded as socially inferior to her adoptive sister and a human punching bag for her Aunt Elodie. Her father doesn't care about her. Her mother is ashamed of her. Just when everyone thinks Gemma is going to make a complete fool of herself, they get a slap in the face.

title: The Grim Reaper Young Lady Wants To Save Her Mastermind Older Brother
How to Retire as a Disaster Necromancer
Trash of the Count’s Family
summary:
Kim Roksu has one life motto: “Let’s not get beat up.”

But after dozing off somewhere midway through the novel “Birth of a Hero,” he wakes up as Cale Henituse - one of the minor villains in the novel who gets the beating of a lifetime from soon-to-be hero Choi Han.

Only time will tell how much longer he has before that dreadful encounter. Can Kim Roksu change the course of this story so he can enjoy a long and lavish life free of the soon-to-be hero?

title: Show Window Scandal
Ranker Who Lives A Second Time
summary:
Yeonwoo’s brother disappeared years ago, and he’s devastated to learn of his death.

As he copes with his loss, he’s given a pocket watch and learns there’s more to his brother’s death: he was betrayed while competing in the Tower of the Sun God.

Now it’s Yeonwoo’s turn to use the knowledge his brother left behind.

Can Yeonwoo navigate that world and gain enough power and experience to reach the top of the tower, defeating his brother’s enemies and all those who stand in his way?

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%91%90-%EB%B2%88-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%EB%9E%AD%EC%BB%A4/2335)

title: SSS-Class Suicide Hunter
summary:
In the mysterious, RPG dungeon-like Tower, Gongja Kim lives a mundane existence, envying all the star hunters. One day, his wish for more is granted with a legendary skill to copy others’ abilities… at the cost of his life. Before he can make sense of it, he’s killed by the #1 hunter, the Flame Emperor! But this activates his skill and now he’s copied a new one, the ability to travel back in time upon death.

How will Gongja use these skills to outplay the competition and rise to the top?

title: I Want To Be Your First
summary:
It is said that cats will haunt the family that killed them for seven generations.　

Kuro, a black cat who has fallen into the role of a "curse god," is trying to return to being a "god of fortune" by completing "seven generations of curses". However, the sixth generation is our protagonist Koutarou Nishikori, and he's hopelessly single, stuck pining for his mysterious first love. As it turns out... that first love is Kuro.

title: The Strongest Hero with Negative Destructive Power
summary:
Decades have passed since the world became flooded with monsters. The protagonist, who enrolled in an academy to train those with aptitude, consistently ranked last in ability tests. It would have been one thing if his abilities were merely low, but because he also inflicted a debuff (ability reduction) on his surrounding comrades, he was called “unwanted” and a “burden.”

One day, while exploring, the protagonist is swallowed by a different dimension and goes missing. There, he encounters a creature from another world and is told the true value of his ability. Originally, magical power is something used to attack by projecting one’s own power outwards. However, the protagonist’s characteristic is the complete opposite of this “output”; it is “input” (absorption), and the ability to suck in external power is his true strength… “Reverse Magic Circuit.” The reason he had been debuffing his allies until now was that he had been unknowingly absorbing their power.

Having learned the true worth of his power, the protagonist now absorbs monster attacks to nullify them and gathers external power to strengthen himself, mastering his abilities and proceeding on the path to becoming the strongest.

title: The Male Lead? I Don’t Want Him
summary:
I reincarnated as Luna, a supporting character who is accused of ruining the heroine and hero’s relationship, and is murdered. I’m not interested in someone else’s man, but the heroine’s friends bully me every day.

*“Why are you trying to get close to someone who’s already taken?”*

*“That’s right, please stop! Why are doing this?”*

*“Stop doing such terrible things!”*

So Luna decides to announce it in front of everyone: “I don’t want someone like Fersen even if you beg me to take him so stop bothering me. I’d rather date Anthes Vincent, who’s rumored to be insane.”

And soon she meets someone who she never expected to meet…

“I heard you have an interest in me? The truth is, I do too. Is it a coincidence?”

title: The Third Prince of the Fallen Kingdom has Regressed
Conquering Dungeons With Copy Paste!
summary: Seo Han-Jun, the protagonist, is cursed by a Transcendent being with a skill called “Copy-Paste” (Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V) and given only 20 years to live. However, this skill only works on himself, and its growth is stunted, leading him to live a disregarded life as a low-level hunter. One day, while fighting in a dungeon, he discovers a way to develop his Copy-Paste skill! With this newfound power, he quickly becomes a world-class hunter. Now, together with his companions, Han-Junmust prevent the impending catastrophe. Will Seo Han-Jununcover the Transcendent’s identity and save the world?

title: The Life Goal Is to Get a Two-Story House
summary:
'No one will love me!'
"No one will ever trust me."

Frequent business failures on her father's part had pushed Jia into a life of hardship, and her boyfriend of six years cheating on her had brought her to the brink of despair.

"If there's a next life..."

She thought it was the end. But then...

"Maerin, are you awake? Are you feeling better now?"

Jia reincarnates as a refugee girl named "Maerin," who has crossed from the war-torn country of Helayton to Perrington. Will the new life as Maerin give Jia a chance to become wealthy and fulfill her dream of having her own home in this lifetime?

title: A Romantic Ending with My 2D Boyfriend!
summary: From flirts to mama’s boys to married men, intentionally Sun Choi keeps dating men like those. Promising to herself, not to date men like those ever again, she developed a game called ‘Dating Simulation.’ Since its release is just around the corner that she went to work even on the weekend and played the game as a developer. She plays a ‘share house version’ where you can meet various men of various classes all at once. However, she gets wakes up in the game as the female character.

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: The oppressed magic tool maker elopes with a mod butler
summary:
I never expected the dull servant to actually be a prince...!

Erin, a young girl who devotes herself to developing magical tools to fulfill her late mother’s dream of "making people happy with magic tools."

However, as the child of a mistress, Erin is in a difficult position and endures relentless harassment from her stepmother.

Despite her struggles to achieve her dream, Erin's hopes are crushed by her stepmother's schemes, and she is pushed to the depths of despair.

In her darkest moment, the only ally she has, the servant Foolda, reaches out to her.

"Would you elope with me?"
